website_summaries.verdict: Get a custom fit for your bike from an elasticized hem and bungee cord, while the heavy duty water resistant material protects from the elements.
pros: Made from durable water resistant polyurethane-coated polyester and double stitched at the seams for extra protection from water seepage
The scorch-resistant heat shield helps protect the cover from damage from hot mufflers and engine
cons: Some users find it comes apart at the seams over time

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry around when going somewhere
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cover, get to work with a hot exhaust and engine. Not a problem, just put cover on and into work I go. When my wife and I go out on the bike somewhere, I just cover the bike up and take off. I don't like the sun just beaming down on my bike if I'm going to be go for a while. This will also keep your seat a little cooler. Everyone has done it, sat on your bike that's been in the sun a little to long! Not with this cover, so I will buy another one when this one tears or wears.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Goldwing Blanket
customer_reviews.text: My first half-cover and it fits the bike almost great, well, if you have the antennas there is no cut-out for them. The cover fits around the antennas fine but seems it was designed without the antennas; just look at the advertisement picture as the bike is without antennas. I do like this cover although I have only put it on once but this is exactly what I wanted for times I park the bike outdoors (work, riding, etc.)
customer_reviews.author: Mothra

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product. Works As Advertised. Excellent Price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit right out the box for my 2018 Goldwing. Held securely overnight in 20+ mph windy/rainy conditions. Windshield, Grips, Dash Console, Seat and Saddlebags were dry after removal. Would've been nice if a reinforced grommets was provided to allow installation of a locking device on the cover when installed for additional peace of mind. That's exactly why I always keep my full size cover in the saddlebags in case the half cover gets "adopted" overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Kelvin T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice cover.........
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfect for my 2012 Harley FLHTP. I used for a multi-state road trip. Kept bike dry from overnight dew and rain. Compacts nicely into a cinch pack. If careful you can cover bike immediately after riding without fear of it touching the hot engine or exhaust.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great cover...with a couple of mods.
customer_reviews.text: Fit my 2007 Harley Davidson FLTR perfectly. I did, however, make 2 improvements. First, I marked where the antenna would come through the cover. Then I heated a nail punch and pierced/cauterized the cover. Now the antenna slides right through. Secondly, I took some heat shrink tubing and covered the 2 hooks that hold the cover down. No worry of scratching the paint while covering. Fit and finish of the cover is superb. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Moonmanvt

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for Indian Roadmaster
customer_reviews.text: This half cover fits my '15 Indian Roadmaster like a glove! It fits even better if the windshield is lowered. The front edge will tuck under the lower part of the fairing along the fork tubes and, if desired, the sides will come down and cover the top of the lowers. The little triangle flaps won't provide a whole lot of side protection for the seating area if it gets windy or during heavy rain, but is more than adequate for normal rainfalls. Great for sun protection, too. Two things to make this cover better. 1) Longer or adjustable straps 2) Straps could be sturdier
customer_reviews.author: M. Smolik

customer_reviews.title: Fits my Triumph Trophy!
customer_reviews.text: First of all, my bike is a Triumph Trophy SE (a sport tourer). I was a little concerned it wouldn't fit, as Amazon warned me of that specifically. However, this cover fits great - with or without the top bag. On a trip, I'll be taking my Top Box inside at night (as well as the side bags), but it's nice to know I have options. I also like how little space this cover takes - critical on long rides, as I need as much room as possible for clothes and electronics. Seems to be well made. I'm very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CAShooter

customer_reviews.title: Fits gl1800 well
customer_reviews.text: Just got it, so I can't comment about durability. Fits the 04 gl1800 very well, skips around the antennas. I have the tallest windshield possible (tulsa tall) along with the kuryaken luggage rack and a full set of wings and it's quite tight but still fits. Comes with a stuff sack which is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: you wiah

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value!
customer_reviews.text: Love this cover, great for parkinglots, easy to install, to keep seat dry, and cool, along with windshield. The site needs to be updated, says DOES NOT fit my Harley TriGlide, but it DOES!!. I ordered it because when I saw the pictures that it was on a big Goldwing, I knew it WOULD fit my TriGlide, and it fits well!! Whoever does the fitment, doesn't know much about motorcycles!
customer_reviews.author: J. W. Jolly III

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a GoldWing!
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove on my Goldwing and like it covers the nose to the top trunk. Covers my gauges and windshield and best off all - the seat! The included hooks are safe and won't scratch as they have a rubber coating around them. I simply hook one to the drivers side foot peg and the other to the rear brake lever - it's a snug fit so it won't get blown off in high wind. Cover has re-enforced areas for the antenna(s) which is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 2010 GL1800 perfectly Updated!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 2010 GL1800 perfectly. got the charcoal grey which matches the Titanium paint nicely. Small when rolled up in it's pouch in the rear trunk. Just got it last week so we'll see how durable it is. Update: Just want to say how happy I am so far. Also I found that rolling it up from back to front works best for me. this way I can see the logo on the front and know quickly how to unroll to recover the bike.
customer_reviews.author: kputer

customer_reviews.title: Half cover
customer_reviews.text: It arrived ....needed this cover , i just wanted to cover the bike while work 8 to 12 hrs. ...i read on you tube , sun can really damage your bike , so this cover should help . I have 2 goldwings 86/ 1200, aspencade, and 03 gw 1800, abs . reviews say it will fit both bikes .....so will see ...ill give an update soon ...
customer_reviews.author: Edgardo matos

customer_reviews.title: Fits my GL1800 Honda Goldwing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my GL1800 Honda Goldwing. It fits perfect, takes only a few minutes to put on, and looks great. I live in Arizona, and I know what it feels like getting on a hot bike. It's like sitting on a toaster! I use this cover while running errands, gym, store, bank, etc. It works GREAT! I just wish someone would invent 'air conditioning' for my Goldwing now
customer_reviews.author: Randy Chenoweth

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and fitting cover, but only good for sitting in a garage or shelter . . . . so what is it good for?
customer_reviews.text: The cover looks good and fits really well on my BMW F800ST with saddle bags and top case, but it tore on the left rear side the second time I used it. I was camping and there was a rain storm, but the winds were not that strong/high. In the daylight the next morning, I noticed that there was a tear on the left rear portion over where it covered the saddle bag. I don't expect a cover to endure tornado's or hurricane's, but would hope that it would last more than two uses and endure a light rain shower.
customer_reviews.author: George Warren

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, fits x-tall Goldwing windshield
customer_reviews.text: I'm a full time motorcycle nomad. This cover is perfect for the road. Small storage size, covers what needs to be covered. Goes on and off - when you want to take it off - very easily. It went through several thunderstorms in Ohio with no problems. I've used it every day for a month. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brit Kai W. Anders

customer_reviews.title: Also the seat isn't horribly hot when he gets on after sitting in the ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband and he tells me it keeps his bike protected from the sun and severe heat in the summer and so protects his paint job. Also the seat isn't horribly hot when he gets on after sitting in the parking lot till the end of the day. He says it fits his bike wonderfully and keeps it dry with no leaks when it is raining. He feels it was a good product for the price point and is pleased with the purchase. Not made out of cheap materials and feels substantial as if it will last for many years.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma B

customer_reviews.title: Quick protection.
customer_reviews.text: This is an easy, quick to install cover with some of the built in quality that should make it last a long time. I can have this on my cycle in less than half the time it takes me to put he full cover on. It has reinforcement material where the stress points from the antenna mounts make contact. So far I have returned to a dry seat. This product works well and balls up in a small easy to carry ball. It has a pouch but I don't use it.
customer_reviews.author: Slanger

customer_reviews.title: It will work
customer_reviews.text: Received yesterday and tried it on my 2005 Honda GL1800A. With the windshield lowered as far as it will go this just fits on, it does not cover the bottom of the top truck but seems secure.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P.

customer_reviews.title: this a really nice inexpensive half cover
customer_reviews.text: I disagree wit the reviews that said this cover was cheaply built. I think it is a quality product especially, for the price. The hooks are rubber covered, the nylon material is thicker than I had expected, it has a soft lining for the windshield and it fits my HD Ultra Classic perfectly. It rolls up small for packing and comes with a carry bag. I did have to cut 2 small antenna holes and then hand sewed a border around the holes to keep them from fraying. Overall, this a really nice inexpensive half cover.
customer_reviews.author: Papa Dave

customer_reviews.title: Great cover fits my 2015 Electraglide classic ultra perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Great cover fits my 2015 Electraglide classic ultra perfectly. It functioned perfectly on a recent 4000 mile trip down the east coast. Seats were dry after nights of rain, keep instruments dry. Pack easily back into its bag, secure and tight fitting so wind should not be a problem. Easy to put on and take off. Would highly recommend this cover for anyone on a long trip.
customer_reviews.author: Nyfiken

customer_reviews.title: It will fit a BMW K1600 GTL
customer_reviews.text: I received this cover yesterday. I purchased it for my BMW K1600 GTL and it fits perfectly. Disregard the message that "This item will not fit your vehicle" that Amazon displays on your screen. It took 2 minutes to put it on the first time. The company logo is on the front, so it is easy to know which end goes where. Once on, I hooked one side to the shifter and the other side to the brake. Easy & quick. I will be using this cover on a daily basis to protect my bike from the hot Texas Panhandle sun at work. We'll find out how it handles our winds. If it holds up, I'll revise to 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch Miller

customer_reviews.title: The cover fits my 2009 Harley Road King with a ...
customer_reviews.text: The cover fits my 2009 Harley Road King with a tour pack. I haven't used it on an overnight trip yet, but I think it will be ok. It should stay on in moderate wind because it fits snug in the front and back and has straps with hooks that attach to the driver floor boards. I hope that I won't have to deal with the morning dew on the bike on my next trip.
customer_reviews.author: ray collier

customer_reviews.title: Meh not for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: This cover is ok to take on the road for occasional use but does stand up very well long term. The general structure holds up but the fabric starts to degrade and small pin prick holes develop. Also discoloration happens fairly quickly. Like I said great to throw in the saddle bags and use it to keep sew and prying eyes off the bike while in the hotel parking lot.
customer_reviews.author: Lirch

customer_reviews.title: Honda 2018 Gold Wing Tour Half Cover
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great cover for my Honda 2018 Gold Wing. It has been very good at protecting my bike and it is very easy to put over my bike. I would recommend this product for anyone who would want a quick cover to protect their bike.
customer_reviews.author: hargist

customer_reviews.title: Works great for a 2006 Honda Goldwing GL1800
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. Very light weight and packs easy. The only negative is the stitching is so so. I only use it when I'm out riding and I need to protect the motorcycle from the Arizona sun and this works great.
customer_reviews.author: kennyatta

customer_reviews.title: Larger size to fit a smaller bike
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after having bought the UltraGard 4-456BK Black Cruiser Motorcycle Half Cover for my FLSS. The cruiser didn't fit even though my bike has no fairing. This fits my bike a little large, but cinches in nicely. Based on how well the cruiser cover didn't fit my bike and the size of this, I'm not sure how it will fit a dresser. This appears to be well made and I don't think I'll have a problem with the elastic hem. The side to side strap should prevent the cover from being blown away. The only thing I wish was added was a pouch for a cover alarm.
customer_reviews.author: Larry in VA, transplanted from 10,000 Lakes

customer_reviews.title: to small for full size touring bike.
customer_reviews.text: I have a Kawasaki Vaquero that I added larger mirrors and a full size tour pack - this cover was to small, but it works good as a full sized cover for a scooter I have, so I'll keep it.
customer_reviews.author: William C. Sween

customer_reviews.title: Great half cover
customer_reviews.text: Love this cover. I ride my bike to work and have to park in a dusty lot. this cover keeps all the dust off the bike as well as moisture and rain. I have found I need to periodically spray cover with rain repellent as we get lots of rain in the south. it will last a few months then start to let moisture through. I just re-spray cover and all is good again. I won't say cover is not doing it's job as we get rain every day in the summer time. I find it hard for any light weight cover to hold up to that kind of abuse.
customer_reviews.author: James Ross

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, looks good and is fairly easy to put on. Have only used it a few time we carry this while we travel or if I am likely to get stuck parking out in the rain. It fit my 2016 Harley CVO Limited exactly as described.
customer_reviews.author: Fordman

customer_reviews.title: It covers my BMW R9T, but a little big
customer_reviews.text: My main quibble on this product is that the color has faded really fast after two months outside. Seems OK otherwise. Easy to tell front from back quickly by the location of the logo.
customer_reviews.author: E. Guttman

customer_reviews.title: Light and Folds up small. Good quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cover to carry on trips to cover my 2018 Goldwing at night. Pro's- Color is just as stated, very deep cranberry/wine. Lightweight, packs small and easy to put on. Stays on the bike without blowing around. Con's - Really wish it was just a tad longer to cover just the tops of the saddlebags. I sprayed it with a waterproofing spray to help during a rain as the cover is water repellant not water proof.
customer_reviews.author: MADELYN

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2016 Honda GL1800 GoldWing well
customer_reviews.text: You have a small bend around antenna, but fits well. Not water resistant at all. My seat was soaked with morning dew. I will get some Scotchgard waterproofing spray....
customer_reviews.author: Larry Scott

customer_reviews.title: Ultra-Guard
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to repeat another reviewers comment regarding the 'S-Hooks' installed on the cover; The cover is nice, fits my Bike very well, but the Metal 'S-Hooks' are an addition that should be coated with thick rubber or silicone material. Installing a cover with "unprotected metal (anything) is a scratch, scrape or ding waiting to happen."I'm going to remove the hooks and either dip them in Truck bed liner several times for a thick coating or slip a piece of new shrink tubing or fuel hose over them.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Light, EZ 2 use, but not great for F6B.
customer_reviews.text: This cover does a great job of keeping rain and dirt off your bike. Looks really nice on the bike and the elastic edges hold the cover on the bike, even with a significant wind. However, it needs a bike with a trunk to fit properly, something the Goldwing F6B doesn't have. After a rain, I need to reach over to pour the pockets of water off the bike. If the maker of this cover wants to turn this from a good to great cover, add some elastic straps that would grab the back of the hard bags, and pull the cover tight on bikes that do not have a truck ... like my F6B..
customer_reviews.author: Big Fat Mike

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a Harley Bagger. Fits just fine. Packs easy in it's own storage bag. It's main purpose is to keep the dew off of the bike in the early mornings. It works well for that.
customer_reviews.author: Devil Dave & Allie

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: Small and compact when traveling. Kept bike dry and protected during storm. Good quality material. Color almost matches my bike perfectly. I reccomend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Ullrich

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit and Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have a 2016 BMW R1200RT with the large BMW top case. This cover fits as if it were custom made for this bike. I've recently returned from a trip where I experienced heavy winds. It didn't lift or become detached. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Itznuthin

customer_reviews.title: Cover fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: Cover fit like a glove. As others have written, manufacture needs to rethink the metal 'J'Hooks. A simple bungee loop would be a better choice. I removed the J hooks and replace with 2 bungee tie downs used for tarps. Not risk of scratching and allows more flexibility to where I attach. For the price, you can't go wrong if using as a simple touring cover.
customer_reviews.author: stuckinnj

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and durable
customer_reviews.text: My second, lasts a couple years before the weather in the NW gets the best of it. I will continue to use as they wear out. Price is good, only wish the storage bag was a little bigger and mesh.
customer_reviews.author: Punisher 10

customer_reviews.title: AND IT HAS LASTED VERY GOOD. THE BIKE IS OFTEN EXPOSED TO THE ELEMENTS
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS MY SECOND PURCHASE OF THIS ITEM. I BOUGHT THE FIRST ONE THREE YEARS AGO, AND IT HAS LASTED VERY GOOD. THE BIKE IS OFTEN EXPOSED TO THE ELEMENTS, AND THIS COVER PROTECTS IT WELL. WILL PURCHASE AGAIN WHEN THIS ONE WEARS OUT IN THERE YEARS. SORRY ABOUT THE CAP LOCKS ON.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: does what it's supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a previous Ultraguard which finally died after 8-10 years of rain/UV/wind. Works well and packs small. I bought a small compression bag at a sporting goods store which helps it pack even smaller, to carry it in my bags.
customer_reviews.author: strider

customer_reviews.title: Daily use
customer_reviews.text: Best cover I have ever purchased. I waited several months to write a review because I've had other covers rip on me. I take this cover off and on everyday since I commute on my motorcycle. I cover it once I get to my destination to protect my beautiful beast from the elements. She's 36 years old and needs all the love I can give her.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Great sun cover!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy cover to throw onto my bike to protect the leather seat and electronics from the damaging sun. I also enjoy being able to throw it on as soon as I’m done riding for the day. But it does fade quickly. Also does hold a bit of resistance to light rain but a heavy downpour does saturate it.
customer_reviews.author: EA

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding half-cover.  Hooks are covered.
customer_reviews.text: Like others say, this is an outstanding half-cover. Unlike others.....mine came with the metal S-hooks already covered with rubber and with white rubber tips. Already there. If they weren't, I was going to dip them in the Plasti-dip (I think it's called) from Home Depot which is used for dipping tool handles and such. But they are already good to go. Fits FLHTCU like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: RicM

customer_reviews.title: I really like the cover and would buy it again
customer_reviews.text: This fits my 2008 r1200GS with top and both side boxes somewhat. It covers the front down to the fender tip including running lights and blinkers. I have a somewhat larger than stock windshield. It covers my square top box and about 3 inches of my square site boxes. I really like the cover and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: yepper

customer_reviews.title: Very nice half cover
customer_reviews.text: Very nice half cover. Well made and will keep the seat a top half of my bike dry. Easy to put on, take off, fold up, and coming with a pouch to put it in. I put heat shrink on the metal hooks, and added some nylon tie down straps on both sides because I expect to be in an area with high winds. Should last a long time. Use on 2014 Honda Gold Wing.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert D. Green

customer_reviews.title: Fit my 03 Honda Shadow 750 perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Amazon said this would not fit my Honda 750 Shadow but it fits perfectly, this is the 2ND one I purchased and its outstanding. The first one lasted six years in the weather at work, the trick is not allowed it to touch your exhaust system which I did make some mistakes a few times and it will not suffer the fool. Watch the pipes!
customer_reviews.author: Dan in Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, nice protection from sun, dust. Have not has a rainy day to test water resistance.
customer_reviews.text: 07/25..Fits my Gold Wing trike like a glove. 10/09...well after 3 months the charcoal color is completely gone. Guess it's water resistant but not sun resistant.. It's now a pokey reddish-pink color except in the bottom. .☹
customer_reviews.author: YAPPIL

customer_reviews.title: Motorcycle Touring Cover
customer_reviews.text: I just needed something to keep the rain off my Electronics when I park it at work during the rainy season ( a long time in Washington State ) and I don't have to worry about a wet seat and controls. This thing will keep the rain out and it packs up nice into the supplies carry pouch. This cover goes on in a minute and has 2 tie hooks to keep it from flying off if a gust of wind come around.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and compact
customer_reviews.text: This cover works well to keep sun and dirt off of my Goldwing. It did not keep it dry when there was a little rain and/or dew. It is lightweight and folds or rolls up to fit in the small bag so it takes up very little space. It is easy to fasten to the motorcycle and tolerated some wind without any issues
customer_reviews.author: Robert E Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Easily fades
customer_reviews.text: I use it at work to protect the paint, seat, and dash screen. Faded after a few days in the sun. Now golden, instead of charcoal.
customer_reviews.author: T. LAGESSE

customer_reviews.title: Great half cover.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second of this exact cover. The first one wore out after 4 years of frequent use. I mainly use it to protect the bike at work from sun and rain during 12 hour shifts. I ride a 2013 Yamaha FJR1300, it covers it very well, more like a 3/4 cover.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Workman

customer_reviews.title: Protects the bike
customer_reviews.text: We are very pleased with the quality and lightweight of the cover. It could have a little more repellent capabilities but overall very nice.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Anti-Bun Warmer!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my BMW R1200CLC perfectly (full dresser) . I burned the first one that I ordered on the exhaust header - my fault. Second one is just as good. Keeps the bike cooler under the hot Floridian sun and my buns don't get toasted after the bike sits outside for a few hours. Good quality and price!
customer_reviews.author: H2

customer_reviews.title: I don't anticipate great results. Fits okay
customer_reviews.text: First impressions: very thin fabric, extremely light weight. I don't anticipate great results. Fits okay, but stitched for bikes w/ a tour pack; Tons of extra fabrics for touring bikes without a tour pack, leading to pooling and terrible water drainage off the fabrick. Not a good fit for a HD Electra Glide w/o the tour pack. Plan to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua A. Hedetniemi

customer_reviews.title: Quick cover
customer_reviews.text: Use this cover for garage use only or when traveling. I experienced fade and wind damage to the material while exposed to the elements. My next set will be used for travel purpose only.
customer_reviews.author: Phil G

customer_reviews.title: for when it rains
customer_reviews.text: Covering the bike when it rains is great and it does give a little sense of security when things are out of sight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cover , great price
customer_reviews.text: Cover worked great and packs well not taking up too much room. The price is much lower than a Harley cover. I am very happy. Used on a 2015 ultra limited.
customer_reviews.author: Jon A Benson

customer_reviews.title: Fits Street Glide perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 2015 Street Glide Special perfect. Actually covers more than I thought! Covers from the fairing to the saddlebags. Haven't tested its water repelling capabilities yet as I just got it but looks to be the perfect travel cover. Headed out on a 3 day trip today so we'll see if it keeps my seat dry from the morning dew.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Fades
customer_reviews.text: I like the way it fits. The only big complaint is that it has faded and I have only had since June. I am concerned that the sun is going to weaken the fabric and it starts tearing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Fit ok
customer_reviews.text: The fit was ok on my Harley limited but it needs openings for the antennas. By bending them down it created force on the the cover and pulled up one side. At least add some Velcro openings to put the antennas though or you close it if you don’t need it.
customer_reviews.author: Rick L

customer_reviews.title: Fades fast
customer_reviews.text: In just a few days it faded from charcoqal to what can be described as an off pink. Still does the job, just diappointed in color fastness.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: What i needed for my YAMAHA FJR
customer_reviews.text: Tried another brand's full cover which is okay but not easy to get on/off my FJR. This by far is a perfect fit for my YAMAHA FJR 1300 - easy on/ff, well made product. I expect this cover to last for a number of years. A minor point is the snaps are metal that hold the cover when parked outdoors. These can easily be covered with tape or some other material - would purchase again - have an ULTRA GARD cover for my other bile that purchased 5 years ago - still looks like new and covers the entire bike.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cover/Bad Metal Clips
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cover and I am very happy with the fit and quality. My only complaint is that the tie down straps have metal "S" hooks. Not a very good idea on the end of an elastic strap that is swinging from the cover during installation. I take a lot of extra care when installing the cover by your self not to scratch the bike with hook. This is one of the few times I would rather have plastic thane metal.
customer_reviews.author: Monty

customer_reviews.title: storm resistant, UV rotten.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, kept bike relativity dry in massive storm. Ripped after three years, having a hard time finding warranty information, but it's reported to have a five year warranty. Though it tore, all that sun/rain was kept off the bike, so it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Sadtler

customer_reviews.title: A light rain will soak through and everything underneath gets a good soaking. It might not be as bad if ...
customer_reviews.text: "Heavy duty water resistant" is some serious BS. A light rain will soak through and everything underneath gets a good soaking. It might not be as bad if there were some kind of protected vent at the top to let out the built up condensation and let air flow through the cover. It is easy to put on and remove and I actually like the S hooks, but the lack of water protection makes me go looking for a different product.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love it. The quality of the material and workmanship is great for the price. I hope to get many years of use out of it. Update: I’ve noticed some reviewers make comments about the hooks. The hooks on the cover I received are plastic coated and tipped, which helps protect the bike from scratches (see picture).
customer_reviews.author: Florida Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit and finish
customer_reviews.text: I used it on my road king special with a windshield and tour pak and it fits good.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P

customer_reviews.title: Fits my 2015 BMW F800GSA nicely & keeps the sun off my bike all day.  easy to install, compact.
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 2015 BMW F800GSA nicely. Will buy another next year when this one wears out. After the summer it's already fading a bit, but still no rips or wear spots, so maybe I can go 2 years - time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Kilroy

customer_reviews.title: Sunlight breaks this cover material down quickly.
customer_reviews.text: It is a great cover to travel with. Quick and easy to to put on Honda Gold-wing. The sunlight deteriorates the material quickly. I cover my bike when I ride to work and in 4 months of use, it has a tear where i covers the antenna
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Discolors immediately (not in sun)
customer_reviews.text: Totally discolored after a week. Was silver but now is Pink.
customer_reviews.author: Aniala

customer_reviews.title: This is a great cover
customer_reviews.text: It Works! The size is perfect. Keeps what you need to keep dry.
customer_reviews.author: John J.

customer_reviews.title: exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a good, affordable, compact travel cover for my 2012 Harley-Davidson TriGlide. This cover fits perfectly and takes up very little room in the draw-string bag provided when storing in the bike's trunk. There are no holes for the antennas, but the antennas are easily removed on the TriGlide, no problem. A half cover is all I wanted for travel purposes and this cover is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Owen E. Westbrook

customer_reviews.title: Put you antennas down
customer_reviews.text: This is my second the first I let go with my last trike.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Ross

customer_reviews.title: Nice compact cover
customer_reviews.text: Good half-cover for the price. Love the color. Minus one star for the metal hooks (scratch risk). I removed the metal hooks and replaced with small velcro straps. Fits my 2015 Kawi Versys 1000 with Givi 55L top box. Small and light weight. Comes with a storage sack. I have a garage, so I will only use this for road trips.
customer_reviews.author: gharshman

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money for a light easy carry cover
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money for a light easy carry cover, only downfall is the metal hooks, I knew it from previous reviews so pushed some plastic tubing over the hooks prior to using, Last thing you want is a 2 cent metal hook slapping your chrome or Paint. A poor manufactuing decision for a motorcycle cover maker, must not ride much!
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: I like the fact it's model specific and quite handy to ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact it's model specific and quite handy to take with you on over-nighters when the bike will be outside.
customer_reviews.author: 1Patriot

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Does anyone know the website I bought this not even 6 months ago it is faded and threads are coming apart and the strap on one side broke off too.I thought it was a nice cover. Now I can't even find away to get a hold of the company and return it.
customer_reviews.author: victoria

customer_reviews.title: Product didn't fit our bikes
customer_reviews.text: Possibly I read the description wrong but this product did not come close to fitting our 2014 Honda Goldwing GL1800. It barely covers our 2007 Honda VTX 1800. Too bad because it appears to be well made for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: Great when a full cover is not needed
customer_reviews.text: Great when a full cover is not needed. Keeps the bike dry as advertised. I leave out at 6 am and there is a lot of dew. Weather its dew or actual rain the cover is wet when I need to store it. So I can't put anything else in that compartment with it.
customer_reviews.author: MakingTheCalls14

customer_reviews.title: Good half cover
customer_reviews.text: Soft material with inner soft lining for windshield and trunk.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect I like the protection I get and the cool ...
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect I like the protection I get and the cool color. I have one problem but I knew this before I purchased it that it was made for the full body Goldwing which my motorcycle is not I have the F6B deluxe version
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L Winston

customer_reviews.title: Fits a Victory Vision tour perfectly, large clips on ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits a Victory Vision tour perfectly, large clips on the lower wings can be attached to floorboards or anywhere really to hold the cover snug.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Jurgensen

customer_reviews.title: This cover works good for traveling and fit my 2006 HD FLHTC perfect
customer_reviews.text: This cover works good for traveling and fit my 2006 HD FLHTC perfect. I was looking for something that would shead the rain off the dash and seats without a lot of bulk, this cover did the trick.
customer_reviews.author: Scott  Seb

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and very durable
customer_reviews.text: Used on my 1500 and now on my 1800. Used less than a year and the stitching around the elastic band is coming apart.
customer_reviews.author: Ken G

customer_reviews.title: Great Ultragard Cover - perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: Great fit! Small and compact for storage. Can’t go wrong with Ultragard products.
customer_reviews.author: Scruffy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT!!!!! Fit better than expected. It is compact, I often bring it with me for those late nights (fights off that nasty dew at the end of the night). I highly recommend this cover.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Pinto

customer_reviews.title: Fits GL1500SE perfect.
customer_reviews.text: My last one lasted 20 years. This one has some improvements and is better than the last. It fits my 1994 GL1500SE perfectly. Came on time and package was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: owen bostic

customer_reviews.title: Easy on and easy off sun protection
customer_reviews.text: It does the job I hoped for. Serve as bikini-quick-top to block sun from seat. I wishes it was just an onch or longer on the sides to better protect sun coming in at an angle.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Silvers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the second UltraGard 1/2 cover I've had. The first one lasted over 10 yrs.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Fits 2015 TriGlide perfect
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly on my 2015 TriGlide after adding a hole for the antennae. I also replaced the metal hooks with plastic ones. Packs up compact. Quality is good. Perfect for road tripping when space is an issue. The only reason I gave it a 4 star instead of a 5 is the metal hooks, which need to be wrapped or replaced with plastic, and the lack of antennae holes for the tour pack. For less than half the cost of the factory half cover. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Robert H.

customer_reviews.title: Soft inside, sturdy outside
customer_reviews.text: Seems nice and sturdy, and the color is great. The hooks do have a plastic cover on the end to keep them from scratching the bike. It is big enough to cover my cruiser even with the trunk bag on.
customer_reviews.author: Linda in Illinois

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with cover
customer_reviews.text: I really like the convenient size and the easy storing of this cover when all the news. Quality of fabric seems to be good and ease-of-use is great.
customer_reviews.author: Greg H.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Fit
customer_reviews.text: This cover fit like a glove on my 2012 Goldwing ABS. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Burk

customer_reviews.title: Need quick bike protection? you just found it.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Ultragarf for my third Goldwing. This GW is a trike and needed a way to keep it covered in surprise rain or to keep the seat cool.
customer_reviews.author: DrRandy

customer_reviews.title: Yes get one!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Kawasaki Concours 1400 and this fit great! Very easy on and off and packs down. Great for trips or a dive into a diner to keep people from looking at your stuff.
customer_reviews.author: TinkermanTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great buy much cheaper than Harley’s own
customer_reviews.text: Great day cover protects from sun as well as water
customer_reviews.author: Sad one

customer_reviews.title: Good option for covering top of bike
customer_reviews.text: I like this cover as its quick to put on an off and protects from dust, rain, and direct sunlight from the top.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Better cover - fits touring bikes
customer_reviews.text: This cover is heavier duty material than the recent Nelson Rigg half cover I had that lasted only 6 months. This one appears more durable. I did replace the two metal hooks with velcro loops instead. Fits either my BMW K1200LT or my Honda Shadow ACE Tourer very well.
customer_reviews.author: dukey

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for 14 Ultra Classic
customer_reviews.text: Very good travel cover and takes up very little space in your bags. It fit my 14 Ultra Classic like a glove. The tie down hooks should come with some type of protective coating on them, but they do not! Just slide some heat shrink on them and saddle up for your next trip! I unscrew my shorty antennas/ flag masts and put them in the tour pack before putting the cover on.
customer_reviews.author: end of the line

product_meta.title: UltraGard 4-458BK Black Touring Motorcycle Half Cover
product_meta.description: Color:BlackThe Classic Series line of covers offers exceptional value without compromising the features you have come to expect from UltraGard. Whether you need to cover a large touring, bagger, trike, Can-Am, cruiser, street bike, scooter or a trailer, the Classic Series is a great value. Tailor fit designs take into account the natural stance of your motorcycle. Heavy duty water resistant polyurethane coated polyester provides excellent protection against weather, dirt and pollution. UV stabilized to maximize fabric life and minimize color fading from sun exposure. Scorch resistant heat shield protects the cover from hot exhaust pipes and allows use of cover immediately after riding. Double stitched four fold interlocking seams to provide the best durability and a water tight closure. Zippered windshield and sissy bar pockets on cruiser covers expand to fit many bike configurations. SoftTek windshield liner to prevent scratching. Large rust-proof grommets prevent tearing. Sewn elastic hem and bungee cord ensures a tight custom fit. High visibility reflective logo adds safety while parked. Convenient and compact storage pouch is easily portable. Five year warranty.
feature_bullets: Tailor fit designs; heavy duty water resistant
Scorch resistant heat shield; double stitched seams
Elastic hem and bungee cord; reflective logo
